BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:SecondDeal.NAME: Second Deal
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:SecondDeal.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Discard 1 card. NL If the discarded card costs 1 or more, return this card to its position.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:PartyPistol.NAME: Surprise Pistol
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:PartyPistol.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL if this card is discarded from your hand, draw !M! card.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:HiddenPast.NAME: Hidden Past
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:HiddenPast.DESCRIPTION: BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Shared. NL Deal !M! damage to a random enemy whenever you draw or generate a card.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:DiligentPast.NAME: Diligent Past
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:DiligentPast.DESCRIPTION: The first attack card you play each turn is played twice, then move to back.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:JoyfulPast.NAME: Joyful Past
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:JoyfulPast.DESCRIPTION: BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Shared. NL Whenever a card is discarded or Exhausted, the front ally gains !M! Block.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:DestinyDraw.NAME: Destiny Draw
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:DestinyDraw.DESCRIPTION: BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Shared. NL Once per turn, when your hand is empty, draw !M! cards and gain [E] equal to their cost.
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:DestinyDraw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Shared. NL Once per turn, when your hand is empty, draw !M! cards and gain [E] equal to their cost.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:AvatarOfFear.NAME: Avatar of Fear
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:AvatarOfFear.DESCRIPTION: BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Shared. NL Whenever you apply BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Fear to an enemy with an intent to attack, reduce their Strength by the same amount for 1 turn.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Sweep.NAME: Sweep Up
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Sweep.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Strength equal to unblocked damage dealt. NL Exhaust.
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Sweep.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Strength equal to unblocked damage dealt.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:PanicShotRetry.NAME: Panic Shot Retry
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:PanicShotRetry.DESCRIPTION: Retrieve !M! random 0-cost cards from your discard pile to your hand.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Silencer.NAME: Silencer
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Silencer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce this card's cost by 1 for each 0-cost card played this turn.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Shift.NAME: Shift
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Shift.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL The chosen ally gains !B! Block and moves to front. NL Exhaust.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:TheGravityofaB.NAME: The Boss’s Gravity
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:TheGravityofaB.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Evil *Deeds (!BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:M2!): Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: /!BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:M2!): Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Lure.NAME: Lure
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Lure.DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card. NL The chosen ally moves to front.
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Lure.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard 1 card. NL The chosen ally moves to front.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:ImmortalMercen.NAME: Immortal Mercenary
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:ImmortalMercen.DESCRIPTION: Summon a BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Mercenary with !M! HP to the front. NL When this BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Mercenary dies, add a cost 0 *Immortal* *Mercenary* card to the discard pile.
